attributes.action: Realign the Disability Living Allowance (mobility component) to equalise wheelchair users and non weelchair users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the rules stand, wheelchair users with healthy upper bodies capable of mobilising a long distance (including wheelchair athletes!) get DLA mobility component much easier than people who do not use wheelchairs but whose ability to walk is extremely limited. This creates discrimination within disabilities as wheelchair users are offered better conditions.
